mapper.select: SELECT s.station_name FROM charging_port p INNER JOIN charging_station s ON p.station_id = s.id WHERE p.id = #{portId}

SELECT o.id, o.order_no, cp.station_id, IFNULL(u.avatar, 'https://cube.elemecdn.com/9/c2/f0ee8a3c7c9638a54940382568c9dpng.png') AS avatar, cp.port_number, cs.station_name, o.user_id, o.port_id, o.start_time, o.end_time, o.status, o.duration, o.create_time, o.update_time, o.price FROM orders o LEFT JOIN charging_port cp ON o.port_id = cp.id LEFT JOIN user u ON o.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN charging_station cs ON cp.station_id = cs.id WHERE o.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY o.id DESC
